item.title: Having trouble will appreciate help very much
item.dc:creator: @gungamma gungamma
item.description:
@gungamma wrote:

Help please i tried to add the working ring of stone i got alot of errors heres how my client.java looks like at the error.

public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == true){ npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

heres the error:

client.java:9344: illegal start of type if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) ^ client.java:11495: <identifier> expected } ^ client.java:11497: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ client.java:13442: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void ReplaceItems(int oldID, int newID) { ^ client.java:13510: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean inwildy2 = false; ^ client.java:13511: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void checkwildy() ^ client.java:13534: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int packetSize = 0, packetType = -1; ^ client.java:13535: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int smitimer = 300; ^ client.java:13536: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean s1 = false; ^ client.java:13537: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean s2 = false; ^ client.java:13539: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int getprize[] = {1,2}; ^ client.java:13541: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int getprizes() ^ client.java:13548: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int randomWeather() ^ client.java:13631: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int sbtimer = 0; ^ client.java:13632: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int sb = 0; ^ client.java:13633: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean sbloop = false; ^ client.java:13634: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean sbscan = false; ^ client.java:13636: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean travelboat1 = false; ^ client.java:13637: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean travelboat2 = false; ^ client.java:13638: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int traveltime = 0; ^ client.java:13640: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int attempts = 0; ^ client.java:13642: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean teleport = false; ^ client.java:13643: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int teletimer = 8; ^ client.java:13644: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int teleX = 0; ^ client.java:13645: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int teleY = 0; ^ client.java:13646: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int newheightLevel = 0; ^ client.java:13648: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void teleport() ^ client.java:13665: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int eY = 0; ^ client.java:13666: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int etimer = 0; ^ client.java:13669: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean showingCity = false; ^ client.java:13670: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int showCityTimer = 0; ^ client.java:13671: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int cityX = 0; ^ client.java:13672: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int cityY = 0; ^ client.java:13674: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean drunk = false; ^ client.java:13675: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int drunkTimer = 0; ^ client.java:13677: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean newAnimRequired = false; ^ client.java:13678: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int newAnimDelay = 0; ^ client.java:13679: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int newAnim = 0; ^ client.java:13681: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int mageTimer = 0; ^ client.java:13682: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean process() { // is being called regularily ev ery 500ms ^ 40 errors Press any key to continue . . .

supposibly i have not enough {'s or }'s or too many of them.

[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 11:46:30 PM[/size][hr]i will send my client.java if you want.
